alert.note: Alert for Gila; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 6:17PM MST until October 15 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 645 PM MST. * At 617 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sunflower to near Sycamore Creek to 8 miles east of Camp Creek to 6 miles northwest of Rio Verde, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, Horseshoe Reservoir and Seven Springs. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 215 and 229. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
